content: the siena court has issued a final ruling on a case that lasted for 3 years the court declared the dissolution of a joint ownership of a real estate property between two parties referred to as fe and ga the court disregarded any requests deductions or exceptions made by either party the court based its decision on specific articles of the civil code fe sued ga to restore a building and requested the division of the property a settlement agreement was reached through mediation the case proceeded to an oral inquiry and a nonfinal judgment was issued a technical report determined the characteristics and value of the property the court accepted the divisional project proposed by the courtappointed expert and ordered the allocation of property portions through drawing lots the case was concluded and the costs were determined the court in siena made a final ruling on september 15 2021
